body: Spent the afternoon practicing #archery for the first time! Here’s a clip of me hitting the target… eventually. What do you think? #targetpractice #firsttime

comments.body: That’s awesome! Archery looks so fun! How long did it take to get that shot?
@78787 Thanks! It took a few rounds to get the hang of it. Definitely harder than it looks!
Not bad for a first-timer! How does your arm feel? I’ve heard it can get sore pretty quick.
@89898 Haha, my arm is definitely sore! Holding the bow steady is tougher than I expected.
Nice! Were you aiming for the bullseye or just happy to hit the target?
@45454 Let’s just say I was thrilled to hit the target at all, haha! The bullseye is next on my list though.
You’re a natural! Are you thinking about taking more lessons?
@34343 Definitely! I’m already hooked. Hoping to improve my accuracy with some practice.
This is so cool! Did you use a traditional bow or a compound bow?
@56565 I used a traditional recurve bow. It felt pretty classic, but I’m curious to try a compound bow next time!
